meta.tagline: See the patterns that shape your connections
meta.defaultTitle: Understand Your Relationship Patterns & Inner World
meta.defaultDescription: Withinly helps you recognize the patterns behind how you connect — with yourself and with others. Built on attachment theory, love languages, and mindfulness, it translates psychology into personal reflections you can actually feel.
meta.keywords: self-awareness, relationships, personal growth, emotional intelligence, attachment theory, love languages, mindfulness, conflict patterns

hero.headline: See the patterns that shape your relationships
hero.subheadline: Discover how you attach, love, and react in closeness and conflict. Gain insights that make your emotional patterns finally make sense.
hero.tagline: You’re not broken — you’re patterned. Patterns can be understood.

hook.headline: We all repeat the same patterns in love.
hook.description: Why you pull away when your partner needs closeness. Why you give advice when they want comfort. Why small fights feel so big. Why you wonder if you’re too much — or not enough.
hook.value: Withinly helps you see these patterns clearly. Not through labels or quick fixes, but through gentle recognition and an AI companion trained in psychological depth.
hook.quote: It's not about what's wrong with you. It's about understanding what makes sense about you.

howItWorks.headline: Understand yourself at your own pace
howItWorks.subheadline: Self-reflection builds step by step. Each layer connects to the next, and your AI companion remembers your patterns to help you notice them in daily life.

step1.title: Notice your patterns
step1.description: Gentle questions inspired by psychology uncover how you connect, express love, stay present, and treat yourself. No categories — just recognition.

step2.title: Get your first reflection
step2.description: A personal narrative ties your patterns together. See why you react the way you do.

step3.title: Talk it through
step3.description: Your AI companion remembers your patterns and reflects them back in real situations. Like a wise friend who never forgets.

step4.title: Go deeper when ready
step4.description: Unlock deeper portraits — like guides that show how you handle conflict, how you build trust, or how you communicate love. You can also sync with your partner for joint insights.

insight.title: Your pace is the right pace
insight.description: Some days you’ll dive deep; other days you’ll just check in. Withinly adapts and remembers where you’ve been.

different.headline: What Makes This Different
different.description: Recognition over diagnosis. Patterns over labels.

dontOffer.title: What you won't find:
items: Personality types that box you in

doOffer.title: What you will find:
items: Language for patterns you’ve always felt
An AI companion that learns your world
Insights that evolve as you do
A safe space to reflect without being “fixed”

different.tagline: Because you don't need to be fixed. You need to be understood.
different.cta: Be the first to try out

trust.headline: Your reflections stay yours
trust.description: This is your space. Everything stays private.

features.title: Data stays yours
features.description: Never sold, never shared, delete anytime

features.title: Private couple insights
features.description: Even synced partners can't see your individual patterns

trust.tagline: Safe reflection is where real growth happens.

couples.description1: When fights about dishes are really about feeling valued. When you try to help but miss each other. When love is there but connection feels hard.

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. Think of it as a mirror that helps you see your patterns more clearly. It draws on frameworks like attachment theory and love languages, but instead of boxing you into labels, it translates them into personal reflections you can actually feel and use.

items.question: What if I'm single?
items.answer: Perfect. Understanding your patterns before your next relationship can be incredibly valuable. Many users say it helped them choose better partners and show up differently.

items.question: How is this different from personality tests?
items.answer: Personality tests give you a type. Withinly gives you a reflection. Instead of putting you into a fixed box, it weaves your patterns into narratives that feel alive and evolving. The focus isn’t on “what category am I?” but on recognizing how I actually show up — in conflict, in closeness, in how I love.

items.question: What about my privacy?
items.answer: Everything stays completely private. Even if you sync with a partner, they only see shared insights — never your individual patterns or conversations.

items.question: Can this replace therapy?
items.answer: No, and it's not meant to. If you're in crisis or dealing with serious mental health challenges, please seek professional help. We're here for self-understanding, not treatment.
